title: Weekly AI News - Week 26, 2025
summary: Major releases from Anthropic, Apple, and Meta, plus significant research breakthroughs and industry investments

trending.description: Anthropic announces Claude 4 with enhanced reasoning capabilities and improved safety measures

trending.title: Apple AI Integration
trending.description: Apple unveils comprehensive AI features across iOS 19, including advanced Siri improvements

trending.title: OpenAI GPT-5 Rumors
